content: the no sweat cup cozy was created because i was tired of my iced beverages in to-go cups slipping out of my hands because of the condensation sweat worked from the top down this cozy tapers as you reach the bottom for a close fit to the popular shape of to-go fast beverage cups while gauge is not critical aim for a tighter gauge rather than a looser one the ribbing adjusts to fit feel free to change colors after the decrease rounds or whenever to use up leftovers the finished size easily covers a large to-go cup just fold the top section down for a medium sized cup also fits a pint size ice cream container and a 32 oz owala water bottle thanks macy samples shown use 30g - 40g 140-180 yds fingering held double or 40g 110 yds of dk yardage amounts include 10% buffer thanks to madelene for testing and my juju crew for encouragement
